title: Wheels Manufacturing Solo-XD in New Sizes and Colors
content:
Wheels Manufacturing’s Solo-XD’s system we reviewed last year just got an expansion with four new cog sizes ($45)  for its popular Solo-XD single-speed conversion kit for XD/XDR hubs, now available in seven vibrant colors! Cyclists can choose from 19T, 21T, 22T, and 23T sizes to perfectly tune their ride… Let’s check it out.

These new Solo-Cogs are designed to provide cyclists with more options to dial in the perfect gear ratio for any riding condition, whether you’re chasing speed or tackling steep climbs. Here’s a quick overview of what makes these cogs stand out:

  • Superior Chain Retention: The single-speed chainrings are designed with a narrow to wide alternating tooth pattern, ensuring superior chain retention and a smoother ride.
  • High-Quality Material: Made from durable 7075 aluminum, these cogs are built to withstand rigorous use and provide long-lasting performance.
  • Colorful Choices: Available in seven vibrant colors, riders can now customize their bikes to match their personal style.
  • Affordable Price: With an MSRP of just $45.00, these cogs offer great value for any cyclist looking to upgrade their gear.

These new cog sizes and color options are the perfect addition to Wheels’ revolutionary Solo-XD Single Speed Conversion Kit for XD/XDR hubs. This kit is designed to seamlessly transform your hubs into a powerful single-speed setup.

Check out more at Wheels MFG.
